title: Battlefield 1942 + Expansions [Portable Windows PC Online Patche
description:
Battlefield 1942 including the expansions Road to Rome and Secret Weapons of WWII already patched to the most recent version and working online since Gamespy is now defunct .. therefore don't exist anymore.

This is a portable version with no need to install from all the 4 CDS. 

Works right from the game folder. 

Just have to add the game CD keys to your registry from the registry file thats included. 

Included also are the CD key changers and CD key generators and a language changer tool available to use. 

Game works with a 32 bit and 64 bit operating system of Windows PC.

This version is Battlefield 1942 v 1.6.19  ... the most recent one to work on a Windows PC already patched working online in the year 2018.

There has been no extra maps added to the Map folders or any changes made other then the game being patched to work online.

The EA GAMES folder and its contents is complete as if the game and its expansions where installed from the 4 CDS. .. no changes here.

Feel free to pass this file or torrent on ... so others can enjoy playing without the hassle that some would have of installing the game.

Long Live Battlefield 1942
